name: Controlled (DAM ViOD - Escola Pia Granollers)
description:
Story

Controlled is a Rouge-Lite, FPS game made with Unreal Engine 4. The game is set on a Sci-fi near future apocaliptic world where AI controls both machines and population. Your mission, free the world form this cotroling AI.
